insert into product (product_name, product_price, product_short_explain, product_detail, displayed, selling, use_option, use_stock, stock, soldout_mark, reg_date) values (#{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_short_explain}, #{product_detail}, #{displayed}, #{selling}, #{use_option}, #{use_stock}, #{stock}, #{soldout_mark}, now())
select last_insert_id()

insert into opd (opd_name, opd_order, plus_price, option_no) values (#{opd_name}, #{opd_order}, #{plus_price}, #{option_no})
select last_insert_id()

insert into product_category (category_no, product_no) values(#{category_no}, #{product_no})
select last_insert_id()

insert into product_image (url, is_main, product_no ) values (#{url}, #{is_main}, #{product_no})
select last_insert_id()

insert into product_option (po_name, po_code, use_stock, displayed, selling, plus_price, po_order, product_no) values ( #{po_name}, #{po_code}, #{use_stock}, #{displayed}, #{selling}, #{plus_price}, #{po_order}, #{product_no} )
select last_insert_id()
